00002 ###############################################################################
00003 #
00004 #  EGSnrc egs++ voxelized human phantom geometry headers
00005 #  Copyright (C) 2015 National Research Council Canada
00006 #
00007 #  This file is part of EGSnrc.
00008 #
00009 #  EGSnrc is free software: you can redistribute it and/or modify it under
00010 #  the terms of the GNU Affero General Public License as published by the
00011 #  Free Software Foundation, either version 3 of the License, or (at your
00012 #  option) any later version.
00013 #
00014 #  EGSnrc is distributed in the hope that it will be useful, but WITHOUT ANY
00015 #  WARRANTY; without even the implied warranty of MERCHANTABILITY or FITNESS
00016 #  FOR A PARTICULAR PURPOSE.  See the GNU Affero General Public License for
00017 #  more details.
00018 #
00019 #  You should have received a copy of the GNU Affero General Public License
00020 #  along with EGSnrc. If not, see <http://www.gnu.org/licenses/>.
00021 #
00022 ###############################################################################
00023 #
00024 #  Author:          Iwan Kawrakow, 2008
00025 #
00026 #  Contributors:    Frederic Tessier
00027 #
00028 ###############################################################################
00029 #
00030 #  A "Voxelized Human Phantom" (VHP) geometry.
00031 #
00032 #  Although a VHP geometry is just a XYZ geometry, due to the huge number of
00033 #  voxels one has to be more careful with memory use for media indices, etc.
00034 #  That's why this separate geometry implementation. With Richard Kramer's
00035 #  phantom data the implementation requires ~12 MB to hold all the organ data
00036 #  in memory. Richard's ASCII phantom data was also transformed into binary
00037 #  format with the result that loading them is almost instantaneous.
00038 #
00039 #  For now the implementation only provides the macro geometry, i.e., no
00040 #  spongiosa micro matrices. Adding the micro matrices is the next step.
00041 #
00042 ###############################################################################
00043 */

00090 struct EGS_VHP_LOCAL VHP_RowInfo {
00091     unsigned short  nbin;
00092     unsigned short *pix;
00093     unsigned char  *org;
00094     VHP_RowInfo() : nbin(0) {};
00095     ~VHP_RowInfo() {
00096         if (nbin > 0) {
00097             delete [] pix;
00098             delete [] org;
00099         }
00100     };
00101     int getBin(int i) const {
00102         int ml=0, mu=nbin;
00103         while (mu - ml > 1) {
00104             int mav = (ml+mu)/2;
00105             if (i < pix[mav]) {
00106                 mu = mav;
00107             }
00108             else {
00109                 ml = mav;
00110             }
00111         }
00112         return mu-1;
00113     };
00114     int getOrgan(int pixel) const {
00115         return pixel < pix[0] || pixel >= pix[nbin] ? 0 : org[getBin(pixel)];
00116     };
00117     int getSize() const {
00118         int result = sizeof(nbin) + sizeof(unsigned short *) +
00119                      sizeof(unsigned char *);
00120         if (nbin > 0) result += nbin*sizeof(unsigned char) +
00121                                     (nbin+1)*sizeof(unsigned short);
00122         return result;
00123     };
00124     void readData(istream &in);
00125 };
00126 #endif
00127 
00128 #ifndef SKIP_DOXYGEN
00129 
00133 struct EGS_VHP_LOCAL VHP_SliceInfo {
00134     unsigned short  firstr;
00135     unsigned short  lastr;
00136     VHP_RowInfo    *rinfo;
00137     VHP_SliceInfo() : rinfo(0) {};
00138     ~VHP_SliceInfo() {
00139         if (rinfo) {
00140             delete [] rinfo;
00141         }
00142     };
00143     void getSliceDimensions(int &nx, int &ny) {
00144         ny = lastr+1;
00145         nx = 0;
00146         int nrow = lastr - firstr + 1;
00147         for (int j=0; j<nrow; ++j) {
00148             int ni = rinfo[j].pix[rinfo[j].nbin];
00149             if (ni > nx) {
00150                 nx = ni;
00151             }
00152         }
00153     };
00154     int getOrgan(int row, int pixel) const {
00155         return rinfo && row >= firstr && row <= lastr ?
00156                rinfo[row-firstr].getOrgan(pixel) : 0;
00157     };
00158     int getSize() const {
00159         int result = sizeof(firstr) + sizeof(lastr) +
00160                      sizeof(VHP_RowInfo *);
00161         if (rinfo) {
00162             int nrow = lastr-firstr+1;
00163             for (int j=0; j<nrow; ++j) {
00164                 result += rinfo[j].getSize();
00165             }
00166         }
00167         return result;
00168     };
00169     void readData(istream &in);
00170 };
00171 #endif

00178 class EGS_VHP_LOCAL VHP_OrganData {
00179 public:
00180     VHP_OrganData(const char *fname, int slice_min=0, int slice_max=1000000);
00181     ~VHP_OrganData();
00182 
00183     int         nSlice() const {
00184         return nslice;
00185     };
00186     int         getOrgan(int islice, int i, int j) const {
00187         return islice >= 0 && islice < nslice ?
00188                slices[islice].getOrgan(i,j) : 0;
00189     };
00190     const VHP_SliceInfo &getVHP_SliceInfo(int j) const {
00191         return slices[j];
00192     };
00193     const VHP_SliceInfo &operator[](int j) const {
00194         return slices[j];
00195     };
00196     int getSize() const {
00197         int result = sizeof(nslice) + sizeof(VHP_SliceInfo *);
00198         if (nslice > 0) {
00199             for (int j=0; j<nslice; ++j) {
00200                 result += slices[j].getSize();
00201             }
00202         }
00203         return result;
00204     };
00205     void getPhantomDimensions(int &Nx, int &Ny, int &Nz) {
00206         Nx = nx;
00207         Ny = ny;
00208         Nz = nslice;
00209     };
00210     void getVoxelSizes(EGS_Float &Dx, EGS_Float &Dy, EGS_Float &Dz) {
00211         Dx = dx;
00212         Dy = dy;
00213         Dz = dz;
00214     };
00215     int getOrgan(int ireg) const {
00216         int k = ireg/nxy;
00217         if (k < 0 || k >= nslice) {
00218             return 0;
00219         }
00220         int jj = ireg - k*nx*ny;
00221         int j = jj/nx;
00222         int i = jj - j*nx;
00223         return getOrgan(k,j,i);
00224     };
00225 
00226     bool isOK() const {
00227         return ok;
00228     };
00229 
00230 protected:
00231     double          dx, dy, dz;
00232     VHP_SliceInfo  *slices;
00233     unsigned short  nslice;
00234     int             nx, ny, nxy;
00235     bool            ok;
00236 };
00237 #endif

00254 class EGS_VHP_LOCAL EGS_VoxelGeometry {
00255 
00256 public:
00257 
00258     EGS_Float        dx, dxi, xmin, xmax;
00259     EGS_Float        dy, dyi, ymin, ymax;
00260     EGS_Float        dz, dzi, zmin, zmax;
00261     int              nx, ny, nz, nxy;
00262     int              ix, iy, iz;
00263 
00264     static EGS_VoxelInfo *v;
00265     static int           nv;
00266 
00267     EGS_VoxelGeometry(int Nx, int Ny, int Nz,
00268                       EGS_Float Dx, EGS_Float Dy, EGS_Float Dz) :
00269         dx(Dx), dxi(1/Dx), xmin(0), xmax(Dx*Nx),
00270         dy(Dy), dyi(1/Dy), ymin(0), ymax(Dy*Ny),
00271         dz(Dz), dzi(1/Dz), zmin(0), zmax(Dz*Nz),
00272         nx(Nx), ny(Ny), nz(Nz), nxy(nx*ny) {};
00273 
00274     ~EGS_VoxelGeometry() {
00275         if (v) {
00276             delete [] v;
00277             v = 0;
00278             nv = 0;
00279         }
00280     };
00281 
00282     bool isInside(const EGS_Vector &x) {
00283         return (x.x >= xmin && x.x <= xmax &&
00284                 x.y >= ymin && x.y <= ymax &&
00285                 x.z >= zmin && x.z <= zmax) ? true : false;
00286     };
00287 
00288     void setIndeces(const EGS_Vector &x) {
00289         ix = (int)(x.x*dxi);
00290         if (ix >= nx) {
00291             ix = nx-1;
00292         }
00293         iy = (int)(x.y*dyi);
00294         if (iy >= ny) {
00295             iy = ny-1;
00296         }
00297         iz = (int)(x.z*dzi);
00298         if (iz >= nz) {
00299             iz = nz-1;
00300         }
00301     };
00302 
00303     int isWhere(const EGS_Vector &x) {
00304         if (!isInside(x)) {
00305             return -1;
00306         }
00307         setIndeces(x);
00308         return ix + iy*nx + iz*nxy;
00309     };
00310 
00311     int isWhereFast(const EGS_Vector &x) {
00312         setIndeces(x);
00313         return ix + iy*nx + iz*nxy;
00314     };
00315 
00316     int computeIntersections(int ireg, int n, const EGS_Vector &X,
00317                              const EGS_Vector &u, EGS_GeometryIntersections *isections) {
00318         if (n < 1) {
00319             return -1;
00320         }
00321         if (nv < n) {
00322             if (nv > 0) {
00323                 delete [] v;
00324             }
00325             v = new EGS_VoxelInfo [n];
00326             nv = n;
00327         }
00328         int ifirst = 0;
00329         EGS_Float t, ttot = 0;
00330         EGS_Vector x(X);
00331         int imed;
00332         if (ireg < 0) {
00333             t = 1e30;
00334             ireg = howfar(ireg,x,u,t);
00335             if (ireg < 0) {
00336                 return 0;
00337             }
00338             isections[0].t = t;
00339             isections[0].rhof = 1;
00340             isections[0].ireg = -1;
00341             isections[0].imed = -1;
00342             ttot = t;
00343             ++ifirst;
00344             x += u*t;
00345         }
00346         int iz = ireg/nxy;
00347         int ir = ireg - iz*nxy;
00348         int iy = ir/nx;
00349         int ix = ir - iy*nx;
00350         EGS_Float uxi, uyi, uzi, nextx, nexty, nextz, sx, sy, sz;
00351         int dirx, icx, diry, icy, dirz, icz;
00352         if (u.x > 0)      {
00353             uxi = 1/u.x;
00354             dirx =  1;
00355             nextx = (dx*(ix+1)-x.x)*uxi;
00356             sx = uxi*dx;
00357         }
00358         else if (u.x < 0) {
00359             uxi = 1/u.x;
00360             dirx = -1;
00361             nextx = (dx*ix-x.x)*uxi;
00362             sx = -uxi*dx;
00363         }
00364         else {
00365             dirx =  1;
00366             nextx = 1e33;
00367             sx = 1e33;
00368         }
00369         if (u.y > 0)      {
00370             uyi = 1/u.y;
00371             diry =  1;
00372             nexty = (dy*(iy+1)-x.y)*uyi;
00373             sy = uyi*dy;
00374         }
00375         else if (u.y < 0) {
00376             uyi = 1/u.y;
00377             diry = -1;
00378             nexty = (dy*iy-x.y)*uyi;
00379             sy = -uyi*dy;
00380         }
00381         else {
00382             diry =  1;
00383             nexty = 1e33;
00384             sy = 1e33;
00385         }
00386         if (u.z > 0)      {
00387             uzi = 1/u.z;
00388             dirz =  1;
00389             nextz = (dz*(iz+1)-x.z)*uzi;
00390             sz = uzi*dz;
00391         }
00392         else if (u.z < 0) {
00393             uzi = 1/u.z;
00394             dirz = -1;
00395             nextz = (dz*iz-x.z)*uzi;
00396             sz = -uzi*dz;
00397         }
00398         else  {
00399             dirz =  1;
00400             nextz = 1e33;
00401             sz = 1e33;
00402         }
00403         for (int j=ifirst; j<n; j++) {
00404             isections[j].ireg = ireg;
00405             v[j].ix = ix;
00406             v[j].iy = iy;
00407             v[j].iz = iz;
00408             int inew;
00409             if (nextx < nexty && nextx < nextz) {
00410                 t = nextx;
00411                 ix += dirx;
00412                 if (ix < 0 || ix >= nx) {
00413                     inew = -1;
00414                 }
00415                 else {
00416                     inew = ireg + dirx;
00417                     nextx += sx;
00418                 }
00419             }
00420             else if (nexty < nextz) {
00421                 t = nexty;
00422                 iy += diry;
00423                 if (iy < 0 || iy >= ny) {
00424                     inew = -1;
00425                 }
00426                 else {
00427                     inew = ireg + nx*diry;
00428                     nexty += sy;
00429                 }
00430             }
00431             else {
00432                 t = nextz;
00433                 iz += dirz;
00434                 if (iz < 0 || iz >= nz) {
00435                     inew = -1;
00436                 }
00437                 else {
00438                     inew = ireg + nxy*dirz;
00439                     nextz += sz;
00440                 }
00441             }
00442             isections[j].t = t;
00443             if (inew < 0) {
00444                 return j+1;
00445             }
00446         }
00447         return ireg >= 0 ? -1 : n;
00448     };
00449 
00450     EGS_Float howfarToOutside(int ireg, const EGS_Vector &x,
00451                               const EGS_Vector &u) {
00452         if (ireg < 0) {
00453             return 0;
00454         }
00455         EGS_Float tx = u.x > 0 ? (xmax-x.x)/u.x :
00456                        u.x < 0 ? (xmin-x.x)/u.x : 1e35;
00457         EGS_Float ty = u.y > 0 ? (ymax-x.y)/u.y :
00458                        u.y < 0 ? (ymin-x.y)/u.y : 1e35;
00459         EGS_Float tz = u.z > 0 ? (zmax-x.z)/u.z :
00460                        u.z < 0 ? (zmin-x.z)/u.z : 1e35;
00461         return tx < ty && tx < tz ? tx : ty < tz ? ty : tz;
00462     };
00463 
00464     void setIndeces(int ireg) {
00465         iz = ireg/nxy;
00466         int ir = ireg - iz*nxy;
00467         iy = ir/nx;
00468         ix = ir - iy*nx;
00469     };
00470 
00471     //int howfar(int ireg, const EGS_Vector &x, const EGS_Vector &u,
00472     //        EGS_Float &t, EGS_Vector *normal=0) {
00473     //    setIndeces(ireg);
00474     //    return howfar(ireg,ix,iy,iz,x,u,t,normal);
00475     //};
00476     int howfarIn(int ireg, int Ix, int Iy, int Iz, const EGS_Vector &x,
00477                  const EGS_Vector &u, EGS_Float &t, EGS_Vector *normal=0) {
00478         ix = Ix;
00479         iy = Iy;
00480         iz = Iz;
00481         return howfarIn(ireg,x,u,t,normal);
00482     };
00483 
00484     int howfarIn(int ireg, const EGS_Vector &x, const EGS_Vector &u,
00485                  EGS_Float &t, EGS_Vector *normal=0) {
00486         int ixs = ix, iys = iy, izs = iz;
00487         int inew = ireg;
00488         if (u.x > 0) {
00489             EGS_Float d = (dx*(ix+1)-x.x)/u.x;
00490             if (d <= t) {
00491                 t = d;
00492                 if ((++ix) < nx) {
00493                     inew = ireg + 1;
00494                 }
00495                 else {
00496                     inew = -1;
00497                 }
00498                 if (normal) {
00499                     *normal = EGS_Vector(-1,0,0);
00500                 }
00501             }
00502         }
00503         else if (u.x < 0) {
00504             EGS_Float d = (dx*ix-x.x)/u.x;
00505             if (d <= t) {
00506                 t = d;
00507                 if ((--ix) >= 0) {
00508                     inew = ireg - 1;
00509                 }
00510                 else {
00511                     inew = -1;
00512                 }
00513                 if (normal) {
00514                     *normal = EGS_Vector(1,0,0);
00515                 }
00516             }
00517         }
00518         if (u.y > 0) {
00519             EGS_Float d = (dy*(iy+1)-x.y)/u.y;
00520             if (d <= t) {
00521                 ix = ixs;
00522                 t = d;
00523                 if ((++iy) < ny) {
00524                     inew = ireg + nx;
00525                 }
00526                 else {
00527                     inew = -1;
00528                 }
00529                 if (normal) {
00530                     *normal = EGS_Vector(0,-1,0);
00531                 }
00532             }
00533         }
00534         else if (u.y < 0) {
00535             EGS_Float d = (dy*iy-x.y)/u.y;
00536             if (d <= t) {
00537                 ix = ixs;
00538                 t = d;
00539                 if ((--iy) >= 0) {
00540                     inew = ireg - nx;
00541                 }
00542                 else {
00543                     inew = -1;
00544                 }
00545                 if (normal) {
00546                     *normal = EGS_Vector(0,1,0);
00547                 }
00548             }
00549         }
00550         if (u.z > 0) {
00551             EGS_Float d = (dz*(iz+1)-x.z)/u.z;
00552             if (d <= t) {
00553                 ix = ixs;
00554                 iy = iys;
00555                 t = d;
00556                 if ((++iz) < nz) {
00557                     inew = ireg+nxy;
00558                 }
00559                 else {
00560                     inew = -1;
00561                 }
00562                 if (normal) {
00563                     *normal = EGS_Vector(0,0,-1);
00564                 }
00565             }
00566         }
00567         else if (u.z < 0) {
00568             EGS_Float d = (dz*iz-x.z)/u.z;
00569             if (d <= t) {
00570                 ix = ixs;
00571                 iy = iys;
00572                 t = d;
00573                 if ((--iz) >= 0) {
00574                     inew = ireg-nxy;
00575                 }
00576                 else {
00577                     inew = -1;
00578                 }
00579                 if (normal) {
00580                     *normal = EGS_Vector(0,0,1);
00581                 }
00582             }
00583         }
00584         return inew;
00585     };
00586 
00587     int howfarOut(const EGS_Vector &x, const EGS_Vector &u,
00588                   EGS_Float &t, EGS_Vector *normal=0) {
00589         EGS_Float tlong = 2*t, d;
00590         int inew = -1;
00591         if (x.x <= xmin && u.x > 0) {
00592             ix = 0;
00593             d = (xmin-x.x)/u.x;
00594         }
00595         else if (x.x >= xmax && u.x < 0) {
00596             ix = nx-1;
00597             d = (xmax-x.x)/u.x;
00598         }
00599         else {
00600             d = tlong;
00601         }
00602         if (d <= t) {
00603             EGS_Float yy = x.y + u.y*d, zz = x.z + u.z*d;
00604             if (yy >= ymin && yy <= ymax && zz >= zmin && zz <= zmax) {
00605                 t = d;
00606                 iy = (int)(yy*dyi);
00607                 if (iy > ny-1) {
00608                     iy = ny-1;
00609                 }
00610                 iz = (int)(zz*dzi);
00611                 if (iz > nz-1) {
00612                     iz = nz-1;
00613                 }
00614                 if (normal) *normal = ix == 0 ? EGS_Vector(-1,0,0) :
00615                                           EGS_Vector(1,0,0);
00616                 return ix + iy*nx + iz*nxy;
00617             }
00618         }
00619         if (x.y <= ymin && u.y > 0) {
00620             iy = 0;
00621             d = (ymin-x.y)/u.y;
00622         }
00623         else if (x.y >= ymax && u.y < 0) {
00624             iy = ny-1;
00625             d = (ymax-x.y)/u.y;
00626         }
00627         else {
00628             d = tlong;
00629         }
00630         if (d <= t) {
00631             EGS_Float xx = x.x + u.x*d, zz = x.z + u.z*d;
00632             if (xx >= xmin && xx <= xmax && zz >= zmin && zz <= zmax) {
00633                 t = d;
00634                 ix = (int)(xx*dxi);
00635                 if (ix > nx-1) {
00636                     ix = nx-1;
00637                 }
00638                 iz = (int)(zz*dzi);
00639                 if (iz > nz-1) {
00640                     iz = nz-1;
00641                 }
00642                 if (normal) *normal = iy == 0 ? EGS_Vector(0,-1,0) :
00643                                           EGS_Vector(0,1,0);
00644                 return ix + iy*nx + iz*nxy;
00645             }
00646         }
00647         if (x.z <= zmin && u.z > 0) {
00648             iz = 0;
00649             d = (zmin-x.z)/u.z;
00650         }
00651         else if (x.z >= zmax && u.z < 0) {
00652             iz = nz-1;
00653             d = (zmax-x.z)/u.z;
00654         }
00655         else {
00656             d = tlong;
00657         }
00658         if (d <= t) {
00659             EGS_Float xx = x.x + u.x*d, yy = x.y + u.y*d;
00660             if (xx >= xmin && xx <= xmax && yy >= ymin && yy <= ymax) {
00661                 t = d;
00662                 ix = (int)(xx*dxi);
00663                 if (ix > nx-1) {
00664                     ix = nx-1;
00665                 }
00666                 iy = (int)(yy*dyi);
00667                 if (iy > ny-1) {
00668                     iy = ny-1;
00669                 }
00670                 if (normal) *normal = iz == 0 ? EGS_Vector(0,0,-1) :
00671                                           EGS_Vector(0,0,1);
00672                 return ix + iy*nx + iz*nxy;
00673             }
00674         }
00675         return -1;
00676     };
00677 
00678     int howfar(int ireg, const EGS_Vector &x, const EGS_Vector &u,
00679                EGS_Float &t, EGS_Vector *normal=0) {
00680         if (ireg >= 0) {
00681             setIndeces(ireg);
00682             return howfarIn(ireg,x,u,t,normal);
00683         }
00684         return howfarOut(x,u,t,normal);
00685     };
00686 
00687     EGS_Float hownearIn(int Ix, int Iy, int Iz, const EGS_Vector &x) {
00688         ix = Ix;
00689         iy = Iy;
00690         iz = Iz;
00691         return hownearIn(x);
00692     };
00693 
00694     EGS_Float hownearIn(const EGS_Vector &x) {
00695         EGS_Float t1,t2,tx,ty,tz;
00696         t1 = x.x-dx*ix;
00697         t2 = dx - t1;
00698         tx = t1 < t2 ? t1 : t2;
00699         t1 = x.y-dy*iy;
00700         t2 = dy - t1;
00701         ty = t1 < t2 ? t1 : t2;
00702         t1 = x.z-dz*iz;
00703         t2 = dz - t1;
00704         tz = t1 < t2 ? t1 : t2;
00705         return tx < ty && tx < tz ? tx : ty < tz ? ty : tz;
00706     };
00707 
00708     EGS_Float hownear(int ireg, const EGS_Vector &x) {
00709         if (ireg >= 0) {
00710             setIndeces(ireg);
00711             return hownearIn(x);
00712         }
00713         int nc = 0;
00714         EGS_Float s1=0, s2=0;
00715         if (x.x < xmin || x.x > xmax) {
00716             EGS_Float t = x.x < xmin ? xmin-x.x : x.x-xmax;
00717             nc++;
00718             s1 += t;
00719             s2 += t*t;
00720         }
00721         if (x.y < ymin || x.y > ymax) {
00722             EGS_Float t = x.y < ymin ? ymin-x.y : x.y-ymax;
00723             nc++;
00724             s1 += t;
00725             s2 += t*t;
00726         }
00727         if (x.z < zmin || x.z > zmax) {
00728             EGS_Float t = x.z < zmin ? zmin-x.z : x.z-zmax;
00729             nc++;
00730             s1 += t;
00731             s2 += t*t;
00732         }
00733         return nc == 1 ? s1 : sqrt(s2);
00734     };
00735 };
00736 #endif
00737 
00738 #ifndef SKIP_DOXYGEN
00739 
00743 struct VHPBox {
00744     EGS_Float xmin, xmax;
00745     EGS_Float ymin, ymax;
00746     EGS_Float zmin, zmax;
00747     bool isInside(const EGS_Vector &x) {
00748         return
00749             (x.x>=xmin&&x.x<=xmax&&x.y>=ymin&&ymax<=ymin&&x.z>=zmin&&x.z<=zmax);
00750     };
00751     bool willEnter(const EGS_Vector &x, const EGS_Vector &u, EGS_Float &t) {
00752         EGS_Float tlong = 2*t, d;
00753         if (x.x <= xmin && u.x > 0) {
00754             d = (xmin-x.x)/u.x;
00755         }
00756         else if (x.x >= xmax && u.x < 0) {
00757             d = (xmax-x.x)/u.x;
00758         }
00759         else {
00760             d = tlong;
00761         }
00762         if (d <= t) {
00763             EGS_Float yy = x.y + u.y*d, zz = x.z + u.z*d;
00764             if (yy >= ymin && yy <= ymax && zz >= zmin && zz <= zmax) {
00765                 t = d;
00766                 return true;
00767             }
00768         }
00769         if (x.y <= ymin && u.y > 0) {
00770             d = (ymin-x.y)/u.y;
00771         }
00772         else if (x.y >= ymax && u.y < 0) {
00773             d = (ymax-x.y)/u.y;
00774         }
00775         else {
00776             d = tlong;
00777         }
00778         if (d <= t) {
00779             EGS_Float xx = x.x + u.x*d, zz = x.z + u.z*d;
00780             if (xx >= xmin && xx <= xmax && zz >= zmin && zz <= zmax) {
00781                 t = d;
00782                 return true;
00783             }
00784         }
00785         if (x.z <= zmin && u.z > 0) {
00786             d = (zmin-x.z)/u.z;
00787         }
00788         else if (x.z >= zmax && u.z < 0) {
00789             d = (zmax-x.z)/u.z;
00790         }
00791         else {
00792             d = tlong;
00793         }
00794         if (d <= t) {
00795             EGS_Float xx = x.x + u.x*d, yy = x.y + u.y*d;
00796             if (xx >= xmin && xx <= xmax && yy >= ymin && yy <= ymax) {
00797                 t = d;
00798                 return true;
00799             }
00800         }
00801         return false;
00802     };
00803     EGS_Float howfarToOut(const EGS_Vector &x, const EGS_Vector &u) {
00804         EGS_Float t = 1e35, t1;
00805         if (u.x > 0) {
00806             t1 = (xmax-x.x)/u.x;
00807             if (t1 < t) {
00808                 t = t1;
00809             }
00810         }
00811         else if (u.x < 0) {
00812             t1 = (xmin-x.x)/u.x;
00813             if (t1 < t) {
00814                 t = t1;
00815             }
00816         }
00817         if (u.y > 0) {
00818             t1 = (ymax-x.y)/u.y;
00819             if (t1 < t) {
00820                 t = t1;
00821             }
00822         }
00823         else if (u.y < 0) {
00824             t1 = (ymin-x.y)/u.y;
00825             if (t1 < t) {
00826                 t = t1;
00827             }
00828         }
00829         if (u.z > 0) {
00830             t1 = (zmax-x.z)/u.z;
00831             if (t1 < t) {
00832                 t = t1;
00833             }
00834         }
00835         else if (u.z < 0) {
00836             t1 = (zmin-x.z)/u.z;
00837             if (t1 < t) {
00838                 t = t1;
00839             }
00840         }
00841         return t;
00842     };
00843 };
00844 #endif
00845 
00846 #ifndef SKIP_DOXYGEN
00847 
00851 class EGS_VHP_LOCAL EGS_MicroMatrixCluster {
00852 
00853 public:
00854 
00855     EGS_MicroMatrixCluster(EGS_Float Dx, EGS_Float Dy, EGS_Float Dz,
00856                            EGS_Float bsc_thickness, int tb_med, int bm_med,
00857                            const char *micro_file);
00858 
00859     ~EGS_MicroMatrixCluster();
00860 
00861 
00862     int howfar(int imic, int ireg, int &lax, int &lay, int &laz, int &newmic,
00863                const EGS_Vector &x, const EGS_Vector &u,
00864                EGS_Float &t, int *newmed=0, EGS_Vector *normal=0) {
00865         int inew = vg->howfar(ireg,x,u,t,normal);
00866         newmic = imic;
00867         if (inew < 0) {
00868             int iz = imic/(mx*my);
00869             int itmp = imic - iz*mx*my;
00870             int iy = itmp/mx;
00871             int ix = itmp - mx*iy;
00872             if (vg->ix < 0)       {
00873                 --lax;
00874                 if ((--ix) < 0) {
00875                     ix = mx-1;
00876                 }
00877             }
00878             else if (vg->ix >= vg->nx) {
00879                 ++lax;
00880                 if ((++ix) >= mx) {
00881                     ix = 0;
00882                 }
00883             }
00884             else if (vg->iy < 0)       {
00885                 --lay;
00886                 if ((--iy) < 0) {
00887                     iy = my-1;
00888                 }
00889             }
00890             else if (vg->iy >= vg->ny) {
00891                 ++lay;
00892                 if ((++iy) >= my) {
00893                     iy = 0;
00894                 }
00895             }
00896             else if (vg->iz < 0)       {
00897                 --laz;
00898                 if ((--iz) < 0) {
00899                     iz = mz-1;
00900                 }
00901             }
00902             else if (vg->iz >= vg->nz) {
00903                 ++laz;
00904                 if ((++iz) >= mz) {
00905                     iz = 0;
00906                 }
00907             }
00908             newmic = ix + iy*mx + iz*mx*my;
00909         }
00910         if (newmed) {
00911             *newmed = micros[newmic][inew] ? med_bm : med_tb;
00912         }
00913         return inew;
00914     };
00915 
00916     EGS_Float hownear(int ireg, const EGS_Vector &x) {
00917         return vg->hownear(ireg,x);
00918     };
00919 
00920     int medium(int imic, int ireg) const {
00921         return micros[imic][ireg] ? med_bm : med_tb;
00922     };
00923 
00924     int medium(int ireg) const {
00925         int imic = ireg/nreg;
00926         ireg -= imic*nreg;
00927         return medium(imic,ireg);
00928     };
00929 
00930     int isWhere(int &imic, const EGS_Vector &x) {
00931         int ix = (int)(x.x*dxi), iy = (int)(x.y*dyi), iz = (int)(x.z*dzi);
00932         EGS_Vector x1(x - EGS_Vector(dx*ix, dy*iy, dz*iz));
00933         ix = ix%mx;
00934         iy = iy%my;
00935         iz = iz%mz;
00936         imic = ix + iy*mx + iz*mz;
00937         return vg->isWhere(x1);
00938     };
00939 
00940     void getIndeces(int ireg, int &imic, int &ix, int &iy, int &iz) {
00941         imic = ireg/nreg;
00942         ireg -= imic*nreg;
00943         iz = ireg/nxy;
00944         iy = (ireg - iz*nxy)/nx;
00945         ix = ireg - iz*nxy - iy*nx;
00946     };
00947 
00948     int isWhere(int jx, int jy, int jz, const EGS_Vector &x1, int *newmed=0) {
00949         int ix = jx%mx, iy = jy%my, iz = jz%mz;
00950         int imic = ix + iy*mx + iz*mz;
00951         int iloc = vg->isWhereFast(x1);
00952         if (newmed) {
00953             *newmed = medium(imic,iloc);
00954         }
00955         return imic*nreg + iloc;
00956     };
00957 
00958     bool isValid() const {
00959         return (vg && micros);
00960     };
00961 
00962     void getStepFractions(int imic, int ireg,
00963                           const EGS_Vector &xi, const EGS_Vector &xf,
00964                           EGS_Float &bsc_step, EGS_Float &bm_step) {
00965         bsc_step = 0;
00966         bm_step = 0;
00967         int mict = micros[imic][ireg];
00968         if (mict) {
00969             // a BM voxel => check step fractions
00970             if (mict == 1) {
00971                 bsc_step = 1;    // all BSC
00972             }
00973             else if (mict == 2) {
00974                 bm_step = 1;    // all BM
00975             }
00976             else {
00977                 mict -= 2;
00978                 // get positions in bm_boxes co-ordinate system
00979                 int jz = ireg/nxy;
00980                 int jy = (ireg-jz*nxy)/nx;
00981                 int jx = ireg-jz*nxy-jy*nx;
00982                 EGS_Vector xcorner(vg->dx*jx,vg->dy*jy,vg->dz*jz);
00983                 EGS_Vector Xi(xi-xcorner), Xf(xf-xcorner);
00984                 bool i_inside = bm_boxes[mict].isInside(Xi),
00985                      f_inside = bm_boxes[mict].isInside(Xf);
00986                 // if both positions are inside the BM box, the entire step
00987                 // is in the BM box
00988                 if (i_inside && f_inside) {
00989                     bm_step = 1;
00990                 }
00991                 else {
00992                     // we have a fraction in BM and remainder in BSC
00993                     EGS_Vector u(Xf-Xi);
00994                     EGS_Float t = u.length();
00995                     EGS_Float ti = 1/t;
00996                     u *= ti;
00997                     if (!i_inside) {
00998                         // initial position outside of BM box => find entry
00999                         EGS_Float tt = t;
01000                         if (!bm_boxes[mict].willEnter(Xi,u,tt)) {
01001                             // line Xi->Xf does not intersect BM box
01002                             bsc_step = 1;
01003                             return;
01004                         }
01005                         // move to entry point
01006                         bsc_step = tt;
01007                         Xi += u*tt;
01008                     }
01009                     if (f_inside) {
01010                         // final position inside BM box. This implies initial
01011                         // position was outside. Because we already computed
01012                         // distance to BM box entry, the remainder goes to BM
01013                         bsc_step *= ti;
01014                         bm_step = 1 - bsc_step;
01015                         return;
01016                     }
01017                     // final position outside. this means that either the
01018                     // initial position was inside or that we moved to the
01019                     // entry point => BM fraction is distance to outside
01020                     bm_step = ti*bm_boxes[mict].howfarToOut(Xi,u);
01021                     bsc_step = 1 - bm_step;
01022                 }
01023             }
01024         }
01025     };
01026 
01027     void getVolumes(int imic, EGS_Float &tb, EGS_Float &bm, EGS_Float &bsc) {
01028         tb = v_tb[imic];
01029         bm = v_bm[imic];
01030         bsc = v_bsc[imic];
01031     };
01032 
01033 
01034     // ********************************************************************
01035 
01036     int       nx, ny, nz, nxy, nreg;
01037     int       mx, my, mz;   
01038     int       mxy, nmic;    
01039     EGS_Float dx, dy, dz;   
01040     EGS_Float dxi, dyi, dzi;
01041     EGS_Float t_bsc;        
01042 
01043     int       med_tb;       
01044     int       med_bm;       
01045 
01053     unsigned char     **micros;
01054     EGS_VoxelGeometry  *vg;   
01055     EGS_Float          *v_tb; 
01056     EGS_Float          *v_bm; 
01057     EGS_Float          *v_bsc;
01058 
01059     static VHPBox bm_boxes[64];
01060     static bool   bm_boxes_initialized;
01061 
01062 };
01063 #endif
01064 
01065 class EGS_VHP_EXPORT EGS_TestMicro : public EGS_BaseGeometry {
01066 
01067 public:
01068 
01069     EGS_TestMicro(EGS_Float Dx, EGS_Float Dy, EGS_Float Dz, EGS_Float bsc_t,
01070                   int tb_med, int bm_med,const char *micro_file, const string &Name="");
01071 
01072     ~EGS_TestMicro();
01073 
01074     int  inside(const EGS_Vector &x)   {
01075         return isWhere(x);
01076     };
01077     bool isInside(const EGS_Vector &x) {
01078         return vg->isInside(x);
01079     }
01080     int isWhere(const EGS_Vector &x) {
01081         int ireg = vg->isWhere(x);
01082         if (ireg < 0) {
01083             return ireg;
01084         }
01085         EGS_Vector x1(x-EGS_Vector(vg->dx*vg->ix,vg->dy*vg->iy,vg->dz*vg->iz));
01086         int ix = vg->ix%micro->mx,
01087             iy = vg->iy%micro->my,
01088             iz = vg->iz%micro->mz;
01089         int imic = ix + iy*micro->mx + iz*micro->mxy;
01090         int iloc = micro->vg->isWhere(x1);
01091         return imic*nr + iloc;
01092     };
01093 
01094     int howfar(int ireg, const EGS_Vector &x, const EGS_Vector &u,
01095                EGS_Float &t, int *newmed=0, EGS_Vector *normal=0) {
01096         if (ireg >= 0) {
01097             int voxel = ireg/nr;
01098             int ilocal = ireg - voxel*nr;
01099             vg->setIndeces(voxel);
01100             EGS_Vector x1(x-EGS_Vector(vg->dx*vg->ix,vg->dy*vg->iy,vg->dz*vg->iz));
01101             int inew = micro->vg->howfar(ilocal,x1,u,t,normal);
01102             if (inew == ilocal) {
01103                 return ireg;
01104             }
01105             if (inew < 0) {
01106                 if (micro->vg->ix < 0) {
01107                     if ((--vg->ix) < 0) {
01108                         return -1;
01109                     }
01110                     micro->vg->ix = micro->vg->nx-1;
01111                 }
01112                 else if (micro->vg->ix >= micro->vg->nx) {
01113                     if ((++vg->ix) >= vg->nx) {
01114                         return -1;
01115                     }
01116                     micro->vg->ix = 0;
01117                 }
01118                 else if (micro->vg->iy < 0) {
01119                     if ((--vg->iy) < 0) {
01120                         return -1;
01121                     }
01122                     micro->vg->iy = micro->vg->ny-1;
01123                 }
01124                 else if (micro->vg->iy >= micro->vg->ny) {
01125                     if ((++vg->iy) >= vg->ny) {
01126                         return -1;
01127                     }
01128                     micro->vg->iy = 0;
01129                 }
01130                 else if (micro->vg->iz < 0) {
01131                     if ((--vg->iz) < 0) {
01132                         return -1;
01133                     }
01134                     micro->vg->iz = micro->vg->nz-1;
01135                 }
01136                 else if (micro->vg->iz >= micro->vg->nz) {
01137                     if ((++vg->iz) >= vg->nz) {
01138                         return -1;
01139                     }
01140                     micro->vg->iz = 0;
01141                 }
01142                 inew = micro->vg->ix + micro->vg->iy*micro->vg->nx +
01143                        micro->vg->iz*micro->vg->nxy;
01144             }
01145             voxel = vg->ix + vg->iy*vg->nx + vg->iz*vg->nxy;
01146             if (newmed) {
01147                 *newmed = micro->medium(voxel,inew);
01148             }
01149             return voxel*nr + inew;
01150         }
01151         int voxel = vg->howfar(ireg,x,u,t,normal);
01152         if (voxel < 0) {
01153             return voxel;
01154         }
01155         EGS_Vector x1(x + u*t);
01156         x1 -= EGS_Vector(vg->dx*vg->ix,vg->dy*vg->iy,vg->dz*vg->iz);
01157         int ilocal = micro->vg->isWhereFast(x1);
01158         if (ilocal < 0) {
01159             egsFatal("x=(%g,%g,%g) x+u*t=(%g,%g,%g) x1=(%g,%g,%g)\n",x.x,x.y,x.z,(x+u*t).x,(x+u*t).y,(x+u*t).z,x1.x,x1.y,x1.z);
01160         }
01161         if (newmed) {
01162             *newmed = micro->medium(voxel,ilocal);
01163         }
01164         return voxel*nr + ilocal;
01165     };
01166 
01167     EGS_Float howfarToOutside(int ireg, const EGS_Vector &x,
01168                               const EGS_Vector &u) {
01169         return vg->howfarToOutside(ireg,x,u);
01170     };
01171 
01172     EGS_Float hownear(int ireg, const EGS_Vector &x) {
01173         if (ireg < 0) {
01174             return vg->hownear(ireg,x);
01175         }
01176         int voxel = ireg/nr;
01177         int ilocal = ireg - voxel*nr;
01178         vg->setIndeces(voxel);
01179         EGS_Vector x1(x-EGS_Vector(vg->dx*vg->ix,vg->dy*vg->iy,vg->dz*vg->iz));
01180         return micro->vg->hownear(ilocal,x1);
01181     };
01182 
01183     int medium(int ireg) const {
01184         int voxel = ireg/nr;
01185         int ilocal = ireg - voxel*nr;
01186         return micro->medium(voxel,ilocal);
01187     };
01188 
01189     int getMaxStep() const {
01190         return micro->mx*micro->nx + micro->my*micro->ny +
01191                micro->mz*micro->nz + 1;
01192     };
01193 
01194     const string &getType() const {
01195         return type;
01196     };
01197 
01198 protected:
01199 
01200     EGS_VoxelGeometry      *vg;
01201     EGS_MicroMatrixCluster *micro;
01202     int                    nr;  
01203 
01204     void setMedia(EGS_Input *inp, int nmed, const int *med_ind);
01205 
01206     static string type;
01207 };
01208 
01304 class EGS_VHP_EXPORT EGS_VHPGeometry : public EGS_BaseGeometry {
01305 
01306 public:
01307 
01308     EGS_VHPGeometry(const char *phantom_file, const char *media_file,
01309                     int slice_min=0, int slice_max=1000000, const string &Name="");
01310 
01311     ~EGS_VHPGeometry();
01312 
01313     bool isInside(const EGS_Vector &x) {
01314         return vg->isInside(x);
01315     };
01316 
01317     int isWhere(const EGS_Vector &x) {
01318         int ireg = vg->isWhere(x);
01319         if (!nmicro) {
01320             return ireg;
01321         }
01322         int iorg = organs->getOrgan(vg->iz,vg->iy,vg->ix);
01323         int mict = organ_micro[iorg];
01324         if (mict < 0) {
01325             return ireg;    // i.e., no micros in this macro voxel
01326         }
01327         EGS_Vector x1(x - EGS_Vector(vg->dx*vg->ix,vg->dy*vg->iy,vg->dz*vg->iz));
01328         int micr = micros[mict]->isWhere(vg->ix,vg->iy,vg->iz,x1);
01329         return nmax*mict + micr + nmacro;
01330     };
01331 
01332     int inside(const EGS_Vector &x) {
01333         return isWhere(x);
01334     };
01335 
01336     int medium(int ireg) const {
01337         if (ireg < nmacro) {
01338             return organ_media[organs->getOrgan(ireg)];
01339         }
01340         ireg -= nmacro;
01341         int mict = ireg/nmax;
01342         int iloc = ireg - mict*nmax;
01343         return micros[mict]->medium(iloc);
01344     };
01345 
01346     int computeIntersections(int ireg, int n, const EGS_Vector &X,
01347                              const EGS_Vector &u, EGS_GeometryIntersections *isections) {
01348         // fix the following
01349         if (nmicro > 0) return EGS_BaseGeometry::computeIntersections(ireg,
01350                                    n,X,u,isections);
01351         if (n < 1) {
01352             return -1;
01353         }
01354         int result = vg->computeIntersections(ireg,n,X,u,isections);
01355         if (!result) {
01356             return result;    // no intersections
01357         }
01358         int nloop = result > 0 ? result : n;
01359         int first = isections[0].ireg >= 0 ? 0 : 1;
01360         EGS_VoxelInfo *v = vg->v;
01361         for (int j=first; j<nloop; ++j) isections[j].imed =
01362                 organ_media[organs->getOrgan(v[j].iz,v[j].iy,v[j].ix)];
01363         return result;
01364     };
01365 
01366     EGS_Float howfarToOutside(int ireg, const EGS_Vector &x,
01367                               const EGS_Vector &u) {
01368         return vg->howfarToOutside(ireg,x,u);
01369     };
01370 
01371     int howfar(int ireg, const EGS_Vector &x, const EGS_Vector &u,
01372                EGS_Float &t, int *newmed=0, EGS_Vector *normal=0) {
01373         if (nmicro < 1) {  // no micro matrices
01374             int inew = vg->howfar(ireg,x,u,t,normal);
01375             if (newmed && inew >= 0 && inew != ireg) {
01376                 *newmed = organ_media[organs->getOrgan(vg->iz,vg->iy,vg->ix)];
01377             }
01378             return inew;
01379         }
01380         if (ireg >= 0 && ireg < nmacro) {
01381             // in macro matrix
01382             int inew = vg->howfar(ireg,x,u,t,normal);
01383             if (t < 0) {
01384                 if (t < -1e-5) {
01385                     egsWarning("negative step %g in macro voxel\n",t);
01386                     egsWarning("x=(%g,%g,%g) u=(%g,%g,%g)\n",x.x,x.y,x.z,
01387                                u.x,u.y,u.z);
01388                     egsWarning("ix=%d iy=%d iz=%d\n",vg->ix,vg->iy,vg->iz);
01389                     egsFatal("quitting\n");
01390                 }
01391                 t = 1e-15;
01392             }
01393             if (inew < 0 || inew == ireg) {
01394                 return inew;
01395             }
01396             // i.e., exits macro geometry or stays in same macro voxel
01397             int iorg = organs->getOrgan(vg->iz,vg->iy,vg->ix);
01398             int mict = organ_micro[iorg];
01399             if (mict < 0) {  // no micro matrix in the new macro voxel
01400                 if (newmed) {
01401                     *newmed = organ_media[iorg];
01402                 }
01403                 return inew;
01404             }
01405             // if here, enters micro matrix.
01406             EGS_Vector x1(x + u*t -
01407                           EGS_Vector(vg->dx*vg->ix,vg->dy*vg->iy,vg->dz*vg->iz));
01408             int micr = micros[mict]->isWhere(vg->ix,vg->iy,vg->iz,x1,newmed);
01409             return nmax*mict + micr + nmacro;
01410         }
01411         if (ireg >= 0) {
01412             // in a micro matrix.
01413             int ireg1 = ireg - nmacro;
01414             int mict = ireg1/nmax;
01415             int iloc = ireg1 - mict*nmax;
01416             //return micros[mict]->medium(iloc);
01417             int imic, ix, iy, iz;
01418             EGS_MicroMatrixCluster *micro = micros[mict];
01419             micro->getIndeces(iloc,imic,ix,iy,iz);
01420             int ilocal = iloc - imic*micros[mict]->nreg;
01421             // now we have to figure out the macro voxel indeces
01422             // in principle one could simply use vg->isWhere(x), but
01423             // this is bound to get us in trouble with roundoff errors.
01424             // we therefore treat the special case where x is in an edge
01425             // voxel of the micro matrix in a special way
01426             int lax, lay, laz;
01427             EGS_Float aux = x.x*vg->dxi;
01428             if (ix > 0 && ix < micros[mict]->vg->nx-1) {
01429                 lax = (int) aux;
01430             }
01431             else if (ix == 0) {
01432                 lax = (int)(aux+0.5);
01433             }
01434             else {
01435                 lax = (int)(aux-0.5);
01436             }
01437             aux = x.y*vg->dyi;
01438             if (iy > 0 && iy < micros[mict]->vg->ny-1) {
01439                 lay = (int) aux;
01440             }
01441             else if (iy == 0) {
01442                 lay = (int)(aux+0.5);
01443             }
01444             else {
01445                 lay = (int)(aux-0.5);
01446             }
01447             aux = x.z*vg->dzi;
01448             if (iz > 0 && iz < micros[mict]->vg->nz-1) {
01449                 laz = (int) aux;
01450             }
01451             else if (iz == 0) {
01452                 laz = (int)(aux+0.5);
01453             }
01454             else {
01455                 laz = (int)(aux-0.5);
01456             }
01457             EGS_Vector x1(x - EGS_Vector(vg->dx*lax,vg->dy*lay,vg->dz*laz));
01458             int inew = micro->vg->howfarIn(ilocal,ix,iy,iz,x1,u,t,normal);
01459             if (t < 0) {
01460                 if (t < -1e-5) {
01461                     egsWarning("negative step %g in micro matrix\n",t);
01462                     egsWarning("x=(%g,%g,%g) u=(%g,%g,%g)\n",x.x,x.y,x.z,
01463                                u.x,u.y,u.z);
01464                     egsWarning("ix=%d iy=%d iz=%d\n",ix,iy,iz);
01465                     egsWarning("lax=%d lay=%d laz=%d\n",lax,lay,laz);
01466                     egsWarning("x1=(%g,%g,%g)\n",x1.x,x1.y,x1.z);
01467                     egsFatal("quitting\n");
01468                 }
01469                 t = 0;
01470             }
01471             if (inew == ilocal) {
01472                 return ireg;
01473             }
01474             if (inew < 0) {
01475                 // exiting current micro matrix => entering new
01476                 // macro voxel.
01477                 // 1. find which one and set new micro region
01478                 if (micro->vg->ix < 0) {
01479                     if ((--lax) < 0) {
01480                         return -1;
01481                     }
01482                     micro->vg->ix = micro->vg->nx-1;
01483                 }
01484                 else if (micro->vg->ix >= micro->vg->nx) {
01485                     if ((++lax) >= vg->nx) {
01486                         return -1;
01487                     }
01488                     micro->vg->ix = 0;
01489                 }
01490                 else if (micro->vg->iy < 0) {
01491                     if ((--lay) < 0) {
01492                         return -1;
01493                     }
01494                     micro->vg->iy = micro->vg->ny-1;
01495                 }
01496                 else if (micro->vg->iy >= micro->vg->ny) {
01497                     if ((++lay) >= vg->ny) {
01498                         return -1;
01499                     }
01500                     micro->vg->iy = 0;
01501                 }
01502                 else if (micro->vg->iz < 0) {
01503                     if ((--laz) < 0) {
01504                         return -1;
01505                     }
01506                     micro->vg->iz = micro->vg->nz-1;
01507                 }
01508                 else if (micro->vg->iz >= micro->vg->nz) {
01509                     if ((++laz) >= vg->nz) {
01510                         return -1;
01511                     }
01512                     micro->vg->iz = 0;
01513                 }
01514                 // 2. micro matrix in new macro voxel?
01515                 int iorg = organs->getOrgan(laz,lay,lax);
01516                 mict = organ_micro[iorg];
01517                 if (mict < 0) {  // no.
01518                     if (newmed) {
01519                         *newmed = organ_media[iorg];
01520                     }
01521                     return lax + lay*vg->nx + laz*vg->nxy;
01522                 }
01523                 inew = micro->vg->ix + micro->vg->iy*micro->vg->nx +
01524                        micro->vg->iz*micro->vg->nxy;
01525                 int lix = lax%micros[mict]->mx;
01526                 int liy = lay%micros[mict]->my;
01527                 int liz = laz%micros[mict]->mz;
01528                 imic = lix + micros[mict]->mx*liy + micros[mict]->mxy*liz;
01529             }
01530             if (newmed) {
01531                 *newmed = micros[mict]->medium(imic,inew);
01532             }
01533             return nmax*mict + inew + nmacro;
01534         }
01535         // outside
01536         int imac = vg->howfarOut(x,u,t,normal);
01537         if (imac < 0) {
01538             return imac;
01539         }
01540         int iorg = organs->getOrgan(vg->iz,vg->iy,vg->ix);
01541         int mict = organ_micro[iorg];
01542         if (mict < 0) {
01543             if (newmed) {
01544                 *newmed = organ_media[iorg];
01545             }
01546             return imac;
01547         }
01548         EGS_Vector x1(x + u*t);
01549         x1 -= EGS_Vector(vg->dx*vg->ix,vg->dy*vg->iy,vg->dz*vg->iz);
01550         int ilocal = micros[mict]->vg->isWhereFast(x1);
01551         int ix=vg->ix%micros[mict]->mx,
01552             iy=vg->iy%micros[mict]->my,
01553             iz=vg->iz%micros[mict]->mz;
01554         int imic = ix + iy*micros[mict]->mx + iz*micros[mict]->mxy;
01555         if (newmed) {
01556             *newmed = micros[mict]->medium(imic,ilocal);
01557         }
01558         return nmax*mict + imic*micros[mict]->nreg + ilocal + nmacro;
01559     };
01560 
01561     EGS_Float hownear(int ireg, const EGS_Vector &x) {
01562         if (ireg < nmacro) {
01563             return vg->hownear(ireg,x);
01564         }
01565         ireg -= nmacro;
01566         int mict = ireg/nmax;
01567         int iloc = ireg - mict*nmax;
01568         int imic, ix, iy, iz;
01569         EGS_MicroMatrixCluster *micro = micros[mict];
01570         micro->getIndeces(iloc,imic,ix,iy,iz);
01571         int ilocal = iloc - imic*micro->nreg;
01572         // now we have to figure out the macro voxel indeces
01573         // in principle one could simply use vg->isWhere(x), but
01574         // this is bound to get us in trouble with roundoff errors.
01575         // we therefore treat the special case where x is in an edge
01576         // voxel of the micro matrix in a special way
01577         int lax, lay, laz;
01578         EGS_Float aux = x.x*vg->dxi;
01579         if (ix > 0 && ix < micro->vg->nx-1) {
01580             lax = (int) aux;
01581         }
01582         else if (ix == 0) {
01583             lax = (int)(aux+0.5);
01584         }
01585         else {
01586             lax = (int)(aux-0.5);
01587         }
01588         aux = x.y*vg->dyi;
01589         if (iy > 0 && iy < micro->vg->ny-1) {
01590             lay = (int) aux;
01591         }
01592         else if (iy == 0) {
01593             lay = (int)(aux+0.5);
01594         }
01595         else {
01596             lay = (int)(aux-0.5);
01597         }
01598         aux = x.z*vg->dzi;
01599         if (iz > 0 && iz < micro->vg->nz-1) {
01600             laz = (int) aux;
01601         }
01602         else if (iz == 0) {
01603             laz = (int)(aux+0.5);
01604         }
01605         else {
01606             laz = (int)(aux-0.5);
01607         }
01608         EGS_Vector x1(x - EGS_Vector(vg->dx*lax,vg->dy*lay,vg->dz*laz));
01609         return micro->vg->hownearIn(ix,iy,iz,x1);
01610     };
01611 
01612     int getMaxStep() const {
01613         if (!nmicro) {
01614             return vg->nx+vg->ny+vg->nz+1;
01615         }
01616         int nmx=0, nmy=0, nmz=0;
01617         for (int mict=0; mict<nmicro; ++mict) {
01618             if (micros[mict]->nx > nmx) {
01619                 nmx = micros[mict]->nx;
01620             }
01621             if (micros[mict]->ny > nmy) {
01622                 nmy = micros[mict]->ny;
01623             }
01624             if (micros[mict]->nx > nmz) {
01625                 nmx = micros[mict]->nz;
01626             }
01627         }
01628         return vg->nx*nmx+vg->ny*nmy+vg->nz*nmz+1;
01629     };
01630 
01631     bool isOK() const {
01632         return (vg && organs);
01633     };
01634 
01635     int getNx() const {
01636         return vg->nx;
01637     };
01638     int getNy() const {
01639         return vg->ny;
01640     };
01641     int getNz() const {
01642         return vg->nz;
01643     };
01644 
01645     const string &getType() const {
01646         return type;
01647     };

01649     void printInfo() const;

01652     void setMicros(EGS_Input *);

01656     EGS_VoxelGeometry *vg;
01657     VHP_OrganData     *organs;
01658 
01659     int     organ_media[256];
01660     int     organ_micro[256];
01661     string  organ_names[256];
01662     EGS_MicroMatrixCluster **micros;
01663     int                    nmicro;
01664     int                    nmax, nmacro;
01665 
01666     static string    type;
